casebody.data:
Ernest James NICHOLS
v.
Brian PULLEY, Assistant Superintendent for Custody - Nash Correctional; Eric Hooks, Secretary of the North Carolina Department of Public Safety No. 296P15-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 11, 2019 Ernest James Nichols, for Nichols, Ernest James. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, for Pulley, Brian, et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the application filed by Petitioner on the 10th of January 2019 in this matter for Writ of Habeas Corpus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Mecklenburg County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th of January 2019."

Ervin, J. recused
